channel.title: Open Season on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Open Season on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Microsoft Put Older Versions of SharePoint on Life Support. Hackers Are Taking Advantage
item.description: Multiple hacking groups—including state actors from China—have targeted a vulnerability in older, on-premises versions of the file-sharing tool after a flawed attempt to patch it.
